com.github.fge.grappa.matchers.join

Class JoinMatcherBootstrap<V,P extends BaseParser<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.grappa.matchers.join.JoinMatcherBootstrap<V,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - value type produced by the parser
    P - parser class

    @Beta
public final class JoinMatcherBootstrap<V,P extends BaseParser<V>>
extends Object
    Bootstrapping a JoinMatcher

    An instance of this class is created by BaseParser.join(Object).

    Its two arguments are a BaseParser instance and the object to use as a rule which will become the JoinMatcher's "joining" rule; this object is converted to a Rule using BaseParser.toRule(Object).

    Its using(Object) method produces a JoinMatcherBuilder; the argument to this method (converted to a rule in a similar fashion as the above) will become the "joined" rule of the produced matcher.

    See Also:
    JoinMatcherBuilder
